item.description:
From Johnny D's:

Kina Zoré is an exciting part of the Boston music scene. Combining elements of traditional and contemporary African music, they have crafted a sound that is all their own. Helder Tsinine leads fearlessly as he brings the social issues and hypnotic rhythms of his native Mozambique to the stage. Come out and experience the thrilling, danceable rhythms of Kina Zoré!

They put on a great show at Ryles a few months ago. Come check them out! The show starts at 7:30pm.

Tickets will be sold at the door ($12)

For anyone that is interested, Duppy Conquerors follows Kina Zore to play some nice reggae tunes. Feel free to stick around and catch them also! Their show starts at 10pm.
item.name: Kina Zore at Johnny D's
